name: 2018/10/11 Dinner Red Cabbage Cumin
description: This Red Cabbage Cumin recipe is a delicious, high-protein, low-carb, and low-sugar dinner option. Perfect for those who are looking for healthy recipes that do not compromise on taste. With ingredients like tender chicken, fresh vegetables, and a hint of cumin, this dish is a great way to enjoy a hearty meal that's both nutritious and satisfying.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the ingredients by washing the capsicum, steamed red cabbage, and red onion. Then, chop the capsicum, shred the cabbage, dice the red onion, and mince the garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk them lightly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In the same bowl, add the tomato puree, ground pepper, salt, and cumin seed. Mix everything well.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the chicken into small pieces and add it to the mixture, ensuring that it's well-coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Once hot, add the chicken and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5 minutes per side. Take the chicken out and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In the same skillet, add the capsicum, cabbage, red onion, and garlic. Saut√© until they start to soften, approximately 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Return the chicken to the skillet. Stir in the previously whisked eggs and cook until the eggs are set, about 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Adjust seasoning with additional salt and pepper if needed. Serve hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
